mapper.select: SELECT no,tname,openhour,tphoto,grade,num FROM (SELECT no,tname,openhour,tphoto,grade,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,tname,openhour,tphoto,grade FROM tourplace ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM tourplacetag ORDER BY tagcode

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW TOURPLACETAG_CONTENT AS SELECT x.tagcode,y.no,y.rname,y.openhour,y.rphoto,y.price,y.grade FROM tourplacetagmapper x JOIN tourplace y ON x.rno=y.no WHERE x.tagcode=7 ORDER BY y.no

SELECT tagcode,no,tname,openhour,tphoto,grade,num FROM (SELECT tagcode,no,tname,openhour,tphoto,grade,rownum as num FROM (SELECT tagcode,no,tname,openhour,tphoto,grade FROM TOURPLACETAG_CONTENT ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/6.0) FROM (SELECT x.tagcode,y.no,y.rname,y.openhour,y.rphoto,y.price,y.grade FROM tourplacetagmapper x JOIN tourplace y ON x.rno=y.no WHERE x.tagcode=7)
